author: Reuters Editorial
title: Former NBA star trying to broker deal to ship masks to New York
description: Beijing-based retired basketball star Stephon Marbury is arranging an urgent shipment of surgical masks from China to New York to fight the coronavirus, he said on social media on Sunday.
content:
(Reuters) - Beijing-based retired basketball star Stephon Marbury is arranging an urgent shipment of surgical masks from China to New York to fight the coronavirus, he said on social media on Sunday. 
Marbury, who was born on New York’s Coney Island, said he… [+1190 chars]
